CIRCULAR 21  / 2000 
 
 
SUB: INSPECTION OF AIRPORTS BY BCAS OFFICERS- 
COORDINATION WITH AIRPORT MANAGEMENT 
 
 
It has been observed that the BCAS officers while conduction inspection at the 
airports do not associate the Airport Director / In charge Airport Management with the 
inspection at the airports.  This results in avoidable correspondence with AAI.  It has, 
therefore, been decided that henceforth the BCAS officers will associate the Airport Director 
/ In charge Airport Management during inspection and point out deficiencies noticed on the 
spot for rectification as far as possible.  However, an inspecting officer shall continue to send 
the report on inspection. 
 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
 (P.MOHANAN) 
Officer on Special Duty (I) 
for Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
 
NO.CAS-5 (11) / 90-I,  
Dated : 19.07.2000
